    private void tfSaveoptionsActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_tfSaveoptionsActionPerformed
        string tfName;
        string tfStudentID;
        string tfCourse;
        string tfCreditHours;
        string tfGradePoint;
        string GPA;
        GPA = (tfGradePoint * tfCreditHours) / tfCreditHours;
                if (tfName.isEmpty || tfStudentID.isEmpty || tfCourse.isEmpty || 
    tfCreditHours.isEmpty || tfGradePoint.isEmpty) {
                    JOptionPane("Space empty. Plese fill");
                }
                else {
                    
                }
                 
                    
                    
    

    }//GEN-LAST:event_tfSaveoptionsActionPerformed
